item.g:description: Deformation Combat Tank Toy in Kenya. Spark your child’s imagination with the Deformation Combat Tank Toy with Lights for Kids in Kenya , now available at Toto Toys and Fun on toto.co.ke . This deformation tank toy in Kenya is crafted from durable, child-safe plastic, ensuring it withstands enthusiastic play while remaining safe for kids. The tank is equipped with colorful LED lights that flash from the barrel and body, adding a thrilling visual effect to playtime. Its standout feature is the transformation mechanism, allowing it to convert from a tank into a robot with moving parts, providing a dual-play experience that captivates young minds. Whether your child is staging epic battles, exploring transformation sequences, or enjoying the light show, this educational toy for kids in Kenya promotes fine motor skills, strategic thinking, and imaginative storytelling. The toy’s robust design ensures it can handle active use, making it a great option for group playdates, solo adventures, or family game nights. It fosters cognitive development and hand-eye coordination as kids manipulate the transformation and engage with the lights, providing a fun way to learn while playing. At Toto Toys and Fun, we’re committed to offering top action toys for kids in Kenya that blend excitement with developmental benefits, ensuring every child can enjoy a world of adventure across the country. This deformation combat tank toy with lights makes an excellent gift for birthdays, holidays, or special occasions, delighting children who love action figures and transforming toys. It’s also a fantastic addition to playrooms, schools, or community spaces throughout Kenya, offering a durable and engaging play option. Order now from toto.co.ke and take advantage of our fast and reliable delivery services across Kenya, ensuring this kids’ tank toy in Kenya arrives at your doorstep in no time. Explore our wide range of children’s action and creative toys in Kenya , including robots, vehicles, and more, and let your child dive into thrilling play with Toto Toys and Fun! item.g:title: Pink Princess Quad Skates for Kids with Protective Gear Set - Children's Roller Skates
item.g:description: Let your child glide with confidence and style with the Pink Princess Quad Skates for Kids with Protective Gear Set , exclusively available at Toto Toys and Games ! This all-in-one quad skating kit is designed for young skaters across Kenya, featuring pink quad skates (traditional roller skates with four wheels) and a complete set of protective gear. Perfect for girls who love a touch of princess charm, this set combines safety, comfort, and style with a vibrant pink design that’s sure to delight. Whether your child is skating at the park, in the neighborhood, or at a friend’s house, this kit ensures a stable and exciting adventure for young skaters in Kenya. Detailed Features of the Pink Princess Quad Skates Set Stable Quad Skates for Easy Skating : These quad skates feature a classic four-wheel design, with two wheels in the front and two in the back, providing excellent stability for beginners and intermediate skaters. The wheels are made from durable material, ensuring a smooth and controlled roll on various surfaces, perfect for kids learning to skate in Kenya. Charming Pink Princess Design : The quad skates are designed in a vibrant pink color with a sleek, sporty look. The pink color scheme adds a princess-like charm, making these skates a favorite for young girls who love to feel magical while they roll. Complete Protective Gear for Safety : This set includes a full range of protective gear to keep your child safe while they skate. The kit comes with adjustable pink knee pads, elbow pads, and wrist guards, each designed to absorb impact and protect against falls, ensuring your child can skate with confidence. Adjustable Sizing for Growing Kids : The quad skates are designed with adjustable sizing to accommodate growing feet. With a simple adjustment mechanism, the skates can expand to fit a range of sizes, ensuring your child can use them for multiple seasons as they grow. Secure and Comfortable Fit : The quad skates feature a hard plastic outer shell with a breathable inner lining, providing ankle support and comfort. Adjustable straps and buckles ensure a secure fit, while the padded interior keeps feet cozy during long skating sessions. The shell’s design enhances stability, making it easier for kids to balance on four wheels. Durable Wheels for Smooth Rolling : The quad wheels are crafted for durability and smooth rolling, offering excellent traction on various surfaces. This ensures a stable and safe skating experience, whether your child is on pavement, concrete, or indoor rinks in Kenya. Lightweight and Breathable Materials : The quad skates and protective gear are made from lightweight, breathable materials to keep your child comfortable during active play. The mesh lining in the skates and pads promotes airflow, reducing sweat and discomfort, making them perfect for extended outdoor fun. Sturdy Frame for Long-Lasting Use : The pink frame of the quad skates is constructed from sturdy materials that can withstand the rigors of active skating. These skates are built to last through countless adventures, providing long-term value for families in Kenya. Why This Quad Skating Set is Perfect for Kenyan Families At Toto Toys and Games , we’re committed to providing safe, high-quality, and fun products for children throughout Kenya. The Pink Princess Quad Skates for Kids with Protective Gear Set is designed to help young skaters build confidence while ensuring their safety and comfort. The quad design offers superior stability compared to inline skates, making it an excellent choice for beginners. The charming pink design adds a princess-like touch, encouraging imaginative play and making your child excited to skate every day. With the included protective gear, parents across Kenya can have peace of mind knowing their child is safeguarded against falls during their skating adventures. Benefits of the Pink Princess Quad Skates Set Encourages Physical Activity and Balance : Skating helps kids develop balance, coordination, and motor skills while promoting a healthy, active lifestyle. Prioritizes Safety with Protective Gear : The knee pads, elbow pads, and wrist guards provide comprehensive protection, ensuring your child can skate worry-free. Princess Design Sparks Imagination : The vibrant pink color inspires imaginative play, making every skating session feel like a royal adventure. Adjustable and Long-Lasting : The adjustable sizing ensures the quad skates grow with your child, offering value for money and extended use. Comfortable for Extended Play : The breathable lining and padded interior keep feet comfortable, even during long skating sessions in Kenya. Stable Quad Design for Beginners : The four-wheel design provides extra stability, making it easier for young kids to learn how to skate safely. Ideal Scenarios for Use Learning to Skate : Perfect for beginners, with a stable quad design and protective gear that provide the support and safety needed to learn skating with confidence....

item.g:title: My Little Board Book Set for Toddlers - Baby Educational Collection for Early Learning
item.g:description: My Little Board Book Set for Toddlers 5-Piece Teeny Baby Educational Collection for Early Learning in Kenya.  Unlock the magic of early learning with the My Little Board Book Set for Toddlers , a thoughtfully designed 5-piece Teeny Baby collection that brings education and fun together for young children in Kenya! This engaging set includes five vibrant board Guzbooks— Colors , Numbers , Objects , Shapes , and Animals & Cars —each crafted to captivate toddlers and babies while introducing them to foundational concepts. Perfect for parents in Nairobi, Mombasa, Kisumu, Eldoret, and across Kenya, this set is an ideal choice for fostering language development, cognitive growth, and a love for reading in children aged 0-3 years. Each book in this Teeny Baby My Little Board Book Set is made from premium, thick cardboard, ensuring durability even with the most enthusiastic little readers. The sturdy pages are built to withstand rough handling, making them perfect for daily use in busy Kenyan households. The Colors book introduces vibrant hues with eye-catching illustrations, such as a bright red apple, helping toddlers identify and name colors in their world. The Numbers book brings counting to life with playful visuals like a school of fish, encouraging early numeracy skills through interactive learning. The Objects book features everyday items like a pair of yellow shoes, teaching children to recognize and name familiar things around them. The Shapes book highlights basic forms like a pink heart with polka dots, aiding in shape recognition and visual development. Finally, the Animals & Cars book combines the wonder of nature with modern fascination, showcasing adorable ducklings alongside a classic red car to teach both animal names and vehicle types. The illustrations in this toddler board book set are designed with high-contrast colors and bold, simple text to stimulate visual and language development in young learners. Each page is carefully curated to engage curious minds, encouraging toddlers to point, name, and explore as they turn the pages. The books are perfectly sized for tiny hands, measuring just right for little ones to hold and flip through independently, fostering a sense of confidence and independence during playtime or storytime. Rounded edges on every page ensure safety, giving Kenyan parents peace of mind as their child explores the world of books without the risk of sharp corners. Packaged in a charming storage box adorned with a bunny and ducklings, this 5-piece educational board book set is both practical and visually appealing. The box keeps the books organized and protected, making it easy to store them on a shelf or take them along for outings across Kenya—whether you’re heading to a playdate in Nakuru or a family gathering in Thika. The lightweight and compact design of the books ensures they’re easy to carry, providing on-the-go entertainment and learning opportunities for busy families. The wipe-clean surface of each book adds an extra layer of convenience, allowing parents to quickly clean up after messy play sessions, ensuring the set remains fresh and hygienic for repeated use over time. This educational board book collection is perfect for interactive parent-child bonding, offering countless opportunities to engage with your child as you read aloud, point out pictures, and ask questions like “What color is the apple?” or “Can you find the duckling?” These activities not only strengthen your bond but also enhance your child’s vocabulary, comprehension, and fine motor skills as they turn the sturdy pages. The books are also an excellent tool for early childhood educators in Kenya, supporting daycare and preschool activities with their focus on foundational learning concepts like colors, numbers, shapes, and more. Whether you’re looking to build your child’s first library or searching for a thoughtful gift for a toddler in Kenya, the My Little Board Book Set for Toddlers is an exceptional choice. Its combination of durability, educational value, and engaging design makes it a standout addition to any child’s learning journey. The Teeny Baby collection inspires curiosity, creativity, and a lifelong love for books, setting the stage for academic success and imaginative play. From the bustling streets of Nairobi to the serene landscapes of the Rift Valley, this set is designed to bring joy and knowledge to young learners across Kenya. Key Features: Comprehensive 5-Piece Set : Includes Colors, Numbers, Objects, Shapes, and Animals & Cars books for well-rounded early learning. Durable Cardboard Construction : Thick, sturdy pages withstand rough handling by toddlers, ensuring long-lasting use. High-Contrast Illustrations : Bright, bold images of animals, objects, and shapes captivate young minds and support visual development. Educational Focus : Teaches essential concepts like colors, numbers, shapes, and vocabulary through simple text and pictures. Safe for Little Hands...

item.g:title: Toy Tea Set for Kids Pretend Play Safari Animal Theme with Teapot and Dessert Stand in Kenya
item.g:description: Toy Tea Set for Kids. Spark your child’s imagination with the Toy Tea Set for Kids Pretend Play Safari Animal Theme , a delightful and interactive play set designed to bring hours of fun and learning to young children across Kenya! Perfect for toddlers and kids aged 3 and up, this charming tea set from Toto Toys and Games features a vibrant safari animal design with a teapot, cups, saucers, plates, and a multi-tiered dessert stand, making it an ideal choice for imaginative play in Nairobi, Mombasa, Kisumu, and beyond. Encased in a colorful suitcase with an inviting “Come Join Our Afternoon Tea Party!” message, this set transforms any playtime into a whimsical safari adventure, encouraging creativity, social skills, and role-playing fun. Crafted from high-quality, non-toxic materials, this kids’ toy tea set is both durable and safe, ensuring it can withstand enthusiastic play while providing peace of mind for Kenyan parents. The set includes a beautifully designed teapot adorned with a cheerful lion and giraffe, accompanied by four cups and saucers, each featuring unique safari animal illustrations like elephants, monkeys, and lions. The dessert stand, a standout feature, is a three-tiered tower in soft pink, showcasing an assortment of pretend treats—cupcakes, macarons, donuts, and pastries—in vibrant colors like red, brown, and purple. These treats are made from soft, safe plastic, adding a tactile element to the play experience as children “serve” and “enjoy” their tea party. The safari animal theme toy tea set comes packaged in a sturdy, portable suitcase with a handle, decorated with a rainbow, jellyfish, and playful animals, making it easy to carry for playdates, picnics, or outdoor adventures across Kenya. The suitcase doubles as storage, keeping all pieces organized and protected when not in use, which is perfect for busy families in urban settings like Nairobi or rural areas like Eldoret. The set promotes imaginative play as kids host tea parties for their dolls, stuffed animals, or friends, fostering social interaction, communication skills, and storytelling. The lightweight design and bright colors also stimulate visual development, while handling the cups and plates enhances fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination. This educational pretend play tea set is more than just a toy—it’s a tool for learning through play. Children can practice sharing, taking turns, and mimicking adult behaviors like pouring tea or arranging desserts, all while developing early social and emotional skills. The durable construction ensures the set can handle repeated use, whether indoors on a rainy day or outdoors in a Kenyan garden, while the smooth edges and safe materials make it suitable for young hands. The teapot, cups, and dessert stand are easy to clean with a damp cloth, maintaining their vibrant look for countless tea parties to come. Whether your child dreams of hosting a safari-themed gathering or simply loves role-playing with friends, this toy tea set for kids is the perfect addition to their play collection. Pair it with other pretend play toys from Toto Toys and Games, like the toy dishwasher, to create a full kitchen experience that encourages creativity and life skills. From the bustling streets of Mombasa to the serene landscapes of the Rift Valley, this tea set brings joy, education, and entertainment to young minds across Kenya, making it an excellent gift for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasion. item.g:description: Let your child roll into adventure with the Blue Striped Inline Skates for Kids with Playful Design , exclusively available at Toto Toys and Games ! These vibrant inline skates are designed for young skaters across Kenya, featuring a blue color scheme with a playful striped pattern on the inner lining. Perfect for kids who love to skate and have fun, these skates combine safety, comfort, and style to create an exciting skating experience. Whether your child is gliding through the park, skating in the neighborhood, or enjoying a day out with friends, these inline skates will ensure a smooth and enjoyable ride for young skaters in Kenya. Detailed Features of the Blue Striped Inline Skates High-Quality Inline Skates for Smooth Skating : These inline skates are equipped with durable wheels arranged in a single line, providing a smooth and stable glide on various surfaces. They are ideal for beginners and intermediate skaters, with wheels designed for excellent traction and control, ensuring a safe and enjoyable skating experience for kids in Kenya. Playful Blue Striped Design : The skates feature a vibrant blue frame with red accents, complemented by a fun striped pattern on the inner lining in shades of red, white, and blue. This playful design adds a cheerful touch, making these skates a favorite for kids who love bright and lively themes. Sturdy and Comfortable Construction : The skates are crafted with a hard plastic outer shell that provides ankle support, paired with a soft, breathable inner lining for comfort. The shell’s cut-out design enhances ventilation, keeping feet cool during active play, while the padded interior ensures a cozy fit for long skating sessions. This feature helps your child maintain control while gliding, making skating a fun and confidence-building activity. Lightweight and Breathable Materials : The skates are made from lightweight materials to reduce fatigue during play, with a breathable mesh lining that promotes airflow and keeps feet dry. This ensures comfort even on warm days in Kenya, making the skates perfect for extended outdoor fun. Durable Frame for Long-Lasting Use : The blue frame is constructed from sturdy materials that can withstand the rigors of active skating. Whether your child is skating on pavement, concrete, or indoor rinks, these skates are built to last through countless adventures. item.g:title: Blue Starry Quad Skates for Kids with Protective Gear and Helmet Set - Children's Skating Kit
item.g:description: Get your child ready for a fun and safe skating experience with the Blue Starry Quad Skates for Kids with Protective Gear and Helmet Set , exclusively available at Toto Toys and Games ! This all-in-one quad skating kit is designed for young skaters across Kenya, featuring blue quad skates (traditional roller skates with four wheels), a matching starry helmet, and a complete set of protective gear. Perfect for kids who love to roll and shine, this set combines safety, comfort, and style with a vibrant blue design that’s sure to delight. Whether your child is skating at the park, in the neighborhood, or at a friend’s house, this kit ensures a stable and exciting adventure for young skaters in Kenya. Detailed Features of the Blue Starry Quad Skates Set Stable Quad Skates for Easy Skating : These quad skates feature a classic four-wheel design, with two wheels in the front and two in the back, providing excellent stability for beginners and intermediate skaters. The wheels are made from durable material, ensuring a smooth and controlled roll on various surfaces, perfect for kids learning to skate in Kenya. Starry Blue Design for Fun Adventures : The quad skates are designed in a vibrant blue color with a sleek, sporty look. The matching blue helmet features star accents and a striped pattern, adding a whimsical touch that makes your child feel like they’re skating under the stars. This starry theme is sure to spark excitement in young skaters. Complete Protective Gear for Safety : This set includes a full range of protective gear to keep your child safe while they skate. The kit comes with a sturdy blue helmet with ventilation holes for breathability, adjustable knee pads, elbow pads, and wrist guards. Each piece is designed to absorb impact and protect against falls, ensuring your child can skate with confidence. Adjustable Sizing for Growing Kids : The quad skates are designed with adjustable sizing to accommodate growing feet. With a simple adjustment mechanism, the skates can expand to fit a range of sizes, ensuring your child can use them for multiple seasons as they grow. Secure and Comfortable Fit : The quad skates feature a hard plastic outer shell with a breathable inner lining, providing ankle support and comfort. Adjustable straps and buckles ensure a secure fit, while the padded interior keeps feet cozy during long skating sessions. The shell’s design enhances stability, making it easier for kids to balance on four wheels. Durable Wheels for Smooth Rolling : The quad wheels are crafted for durability and smooth rolling, offering excellent traction on various surfaces. This ensures a stable and safe skating experience, whether your child is on pavement, concrete, or indoor rinks in Kenya. Lightweight and Breathable Materials : The quad skates and protective gear are made from lightweight, breathable materials to keep your child comfortable during active play. The mesh lining in the skates and pads promotes airflow, reducing sweat and discomfort, making them perfect for extended outdoor fun. Sturdy Frame for Long-Lasting Use : The blue frame of the quad skates is constructed from sturdy materials that can withstand the rigors of active skating. These skates are built to last through countless adventures, providing long-term value for families in Kenya. Why This Quad Skating Set is Perfect for Kenyan Families At Toto Toys and Games , we’re committed to providing safe, high-quality, and fun products for children throughout Kenya. This all-in-one skating kit is designed for young skaters across Kenya, featuring blue inline skates with a playful character design, a matching starry helmet, a complete set of protective gear, and a convenient carrying bag. item.g:title: Black Camping Chair Foldable and Portable with Side Pocket Portable for Outdoor Events
item.g:description: Folding Chair for Adults. Shop the Folding Chair for Adults Portable Black Camping Chair with side pocket at Toto Toys & Fun Kenya. Perfect for camping, outdoor events, and relaxation in Nairobi, Mombasa, and beyond. Order now! Elevate your outdoor experience with the Folding Chair for Adults Portable Black Camping Chair with Side Pocket , a versatile and durable seating solution designed for adults seeking comfort and convenience across Kenya! Ideal for camping trips, picnics, beach outings, or casual gatherings in Nairobi, Mombasa, Kisumu, and beyond, this folding chair from Toto Toys & Fun combines portability, sturdy construction, and practical features to ensure you can relax anywhere, anytime. Whether you’re enjoying a weekend in the wilderness or hosting a family barbecue, this chair provides the perfect blend of functionality and ease for Kenyan adventurers and leisure enthusiasts. Crafted from premium, weather-resistant 600D Oxford fabric, this portable camping chair is built to withstand the elements while offering a comfortable seating experience. The fabric, in a sleek black color, is tear-resistant and easy to clean, making it ideal for rugged outdoor use, from dusty campsites to sandy beaches. The chair’s frame is constructed from high-grade steel with a powder-coated finish, providing excellent stability and resistance to rust, even in Kenya’s diverse climates—whether it’s the humid coastal regions of Diani or the cooler highlands of Eldoret. Measuring 80 cm high, 50 cm wide, and 50 cm deep when unfolded, the chair offers ample space for adults, with a weight capacity of up to 120 kg, ensuring a secure and supportive seat for users of various sizes. A key feature of this adult folding chair is its compact, foldable design, which collapses to a slim 90 cm long and 15 cm wide for effortless storage and transport. The chair includes a built-in carrying strap, allowing you to sling it over your shoulder or stow it in a car trunk with ease—perfect for spontaneous trips across Kenya, from a hiking adventure in the Aberdares to a family gathering in Thika. The side pocket, measuring 20 cm by 15 cm, provides convenient storage for essentials like a water bottle, phone, book, or snacks, keeping your items within reach while you relax. The chair’s wide seat and angled backrest are designed for ergonomic comfort, supporting your back and allowing you to unwind after a long day of activities, whether you’re watching a sunset or enjoying a fireside chat. This outdoor event chair is engineered for quick setup, unfolding in seconds with no assembly required, which is ideal for busy adults in Kenya who value convenience. The steel frame features reinforced joints for enhanced stability, and the non-slip rubber feet ensure the chair stays in place on various surfaces, from tiled patios in Nairobi homes to grassy fields in Nakuru. Weighing just 2.5 kg, the chair is lightweight enough to carry without strain, making it a practical choice for festivals, sporting events, or even as extra seating for home gatherings. Its versatility extends to indoor use as well, providing a temporary seat for parties or visitors when space is limited. Durability and practicality are at the heart of this portable leisure chair . item.g:title: Pink Princess Children's Bike with Training Wheels and Basket - Girls' Bicycle
item.g:description: A Magical Ride for Your Little Princess Transform your child’s outdoor playtime with the Pink Princess Children's Bike with Training Wheels and Basket, exclusively available at Toto Toys and Games! This beautifully designed girls' bicycle is crafted to bring joy and confidence to young riders across Kenya.  Featuring a stunning pink frame with princess-themed details, sturdy training wheels, and a practical front basket, this bike is perfect for children who are just learning to ride. Ideal for kids in any part of Kenya, this bike combines safety, style, and functionality to create unforgettable cycling adventures. Detailed Features of the Pink Princess Bike Sturdy Training Wheels for Beginners : Equipped with detachable training wheels, this bike provides the stability young riders need to build confidence while learning to balance and pedal. The wheels ensure a safe and smooth transition as your child progresses to riding independently. Charming Pink Princess Design : The vibrant pink frame is adorned with delicate princess-themed graphics, including floral accents and a whimsical font that reads "Children's Bike." This enchanting design captures the imagination of young girls, making every ride feel like a royal adventure. Convenient Front Basket : A matching pink basket is securely attached to the handlebars, offering ample space for your child to carry her favorite toys, snacks, water bottle, or small treasures. It’s perfect for adding a touch of practicality to her imaginative play. Durable Frame for Long-Lasting Fun : Constructed with a high-quality frame, this bike is built to withstand the rigors of active play. Whether your child is riding on paved paths, grassy lawns, or uneven terrains across Kenya, this bike ensures durability and safety. Comfortable and Adjustable Components : The padded seat is designed for comfort during long rides, and both the seat and handlebars can be adjusted to accommodate your child’s growth. The ergonomic handlebar grips are soft and easy for small hands to hold, reducing strain during extended play. Smooth-Rolling Tires with Excellent Grip : The bike features thick, durable tires that provide excellent traction on various surfaces, ensuring a smooth and safe ride. The tires are designed to handle different terrains in Kenya, from urban streets to rural pathways. Easy-to-Use Pedals and Brakes : The pedals are lightweight and textured for a secure grip, making it easy for your child to pedal with confidence. The bike also includes a reliable hand brake system, allowing your child to stop safely and learn braking skills early on. Why This Bike is Perfect for Kenyan Families At Toto Toys and Games , we’re passionate about providing high-quality, safe, and fun products for children throughout Kenya. The Pink Princess Children's Bike is thoughtfully designed to support your child’s development while offering endless hours of outdoor enjoyment. The training wheels make it an excellent choice for beginners, helping kids develop balance, coordination, and motor skills at their own pace. The princess-inspired design adds a magical touch, encouraging imaginative play and making your child excited to ride every day. Whether your child is exploring the neighborhood, visiting friends, or enjoying a family outing, this bike is the perfect companion for her early cycling journey. Benefits of the Pink Princess Bike Encourages Physical Activity : Promotes a healthy, active lifestyle by inspiring kids to spend more time outdoors, riding and exploring their surroundings in Kenya. Boosts Confidence and Independence : The training wheels and adjustable features allow your child to learn at their own pace, building confidence with every ride. Sparks Imagination with Princess Theme : The enchanting pink design with princess details fuels imaginative play, turning every ride into a magical adventure. Safe and Reliable for Young Riders : From the sturdy frame to the non-slip tires and easy brakes, this bike prioritizes safety for peace of mind for parents across Kenya. Versatile for All Terrains : Designed to handle various surfaces, making it suitable for urban, suburban, or rural areas in Kenya. Ideal Scenarios for Use Learning to Ride : Perfect for beginners who are taking their first steps into cycling, with training wheels that provide extra support. Outdoor Family Fun : Great for family outings, park visits, or weekend adventures where your child can ride alongside siblings or friends. Gifting for Special Occasions : An ideal gift for birthdays, holidays, or celebrations, bringing joy to any young girl who dreams of being a princess. Daily Play and Exploration : Whether it’s a quick ride around the compound or a longer journey to a nearby playground, this bike is ready for every adventure. Order Now and Make Her Dreams Come True! item.g:title: Toy Dishwasher for Kids Pretend Play Kitchen Set with Running Water and Accessories
item.g:description: Toy Dishwasher for Kids. Bring the joy of pretend play to your child’s world with the Toy Dishwasher for Kids Pretend Play Kitchen Set , a delightful and interactive toy designed to inspire creativity and skill development for young children across Kenya! Perfect for toddlers and kids aged 3 and up, this engaging kitchen set from Toto Toys and Games features a realistic dishwasher with running water, making it a standout addition to any playtime routine in Nairobi, Mombasa, Kisumu, or beyond. This toy dishwasher is more than just fun—it’s an educational tool that teaches kids about household chores, responsibility, and teamwork while keeping them entertained for hours. Crafted from high-quality, non-toxic plastic, this kids’ toy dishwasher boasts a sturdy and safe design that can withstand enthusiastic play. The dishwasher comes in a charming pink and purple color scheme, featuring a double sink with a working faucet that dispenses water, mimicking a real kitchen appliance. The set includes a variety of accessories to enhance the play experience: colorful plates, cups, spoons, forks, knives, a sponge, a bottle, and a dish rack, all perfectly sized for little hands. The running water feature allows children to “wash” the dishes by filling the sink, adding a hands-on element that makes playtime feel authentic and engaging. The water drains easily, ensuring a mess-free experience, while the included rack provides a convenient spot to “dry” the dishes, encouraging role-playing and organization skills. This pretend play kitchen set is designed to spark imagination as kids mimic adult activities like washing dishes after a pretend meal. The faucet, with its silver finish, adds a realistic touch, while the playful design—complete with a “Wash Me Dishes” label—invites children to dive into their own kitchen adventures. The toy dishwasher promotes fine motor skills as kids handle the small accessories, and it fosters cognitive development by teaching cause-and-effect as they fill and drain the water. It’s also a fantastic way to encourage social play, whether your child is playing solo, with siblings, or hosting a pretend tea party with friends in Kenya’s vibrant communities. The educational toy dishwasher comes neatly packaged in a branded box, making it an excellent gift option for birthdays, holidays, or special occasions. Its compact size allows it to fit easily into playrooms, living rooms, or even outdoor play areas, making it versatile for Kenyan families with varying space needs. The durable construction ensures it can handle repeated use, while the smooth edges and safe materials provide peace of mind for parents. The set requires no batteries, relying solely on manual water play, which makes it an eco-friendly and hassle-free choice for busy households across the country. Whether your child dreams of being a chef or simply loves role-playing, this toy dishwasher for kids is the perfect addition to their pretend play collection. Pair it with other kitchen toys from Toto Toys and Games to create a full pretend kitchen experience, helping kids develop life skills, creativity, and confidence. From the bustling streets of Nairobi to the serene towns of Eldoret, this dishwasher set brings endless fun and learning to young minds across Kenya. Key Features: Running Water Feature : Functional faucet dispenses water for realistic dishwashing play. Complete Accessory Set : Includes plates, cups, cutlery, sponge, bottle, and dish rack for immersive play. Durable Design : Made from high-quality, non-toxic plastic with smooth edges for safety. Educational Value : Teaches household chores, fine motor skills, and cause-and-effect. Compact & Portable : Fits easily into any play area, ideal for indoor and outdoor use. Vibrant Design : Pink and purple colors with a playful “Wash Me Dishes” label to attract kids. Gift-Ready Packaging : Comes in a branded box, perfect for gifting. No Batteries Needed : Eco-friendly, manual operation for hassle-free play. Enhance your child’s pretend play with the Toy Dishwasher for Kids Pretend Play Kitchen Set , a fun and educational toy that brings the kitchen to life for children in Kenya. Shop now at Toto Toys and Games and watch your little one’s imagination soar!

item.g:description: Swing into Action with Spider-Man Skates for Kids Unleash your child’s inner superhero with the Spider-Man Inline Skates for Kids with Protective Gear and Helmet Set, exclusively available at Toto Toys and Games! This exciting skating kit is designed for young adventurers across Kenya, featuring blue and black inline skates, a Spider-Man-themed helmet, and a complete set of protective gear. Perfect for kids who idolize Spider-Man, this set combines safety, comfort, and style with a bold Spider-Man design that’s sure to thrill young skaters. Whether your child is gliding through the park, skating in the neighborhood, or having fun with friends, this kit ensures a safe and action-packed experience for kids in Kenya. The blue and black color scheme, accented with sleek designs, gives the skates a superhero vibe that kids will love. The wheels are made from high-quality material, ensuring excellent traction and control for a safe skating experience. Spider-Man-Themed Helmet for Safety : The set includes a sturdy helmet featuring a vibrant Spider-Man design with a red Spider-Man graphic against a blue web-patterned background. The helmet is equipped with ventilation holes for breathability and an adjustable strap to ensure a secure fit, providing essential head protection during skating sessions. With an easy-to-use adjustment mechanism, the skates can expand to fit a range of sizes, ensuring your child can enjoy them for multiple seasons as they grow. Smooth-Rolling Bearings for Easy Skating : The skates are equipped with high-quality bearings that ensure smooth and effortless rolling. This feature allows your child to glide easily while maintaining control, making skating a fun and enjoyable activity for kids in Kenya. Breathable and Lightweight Materials : Both the skates and protective gear are made from lightweight, breathable materials to keep your child comfortable during active play. The mesh lining in the skates and pads promotes airflow, reducing sweat and discomfort even on warm days. item.g:title: Princess Dollhouse for Kids 4-Story Pink Mansion with Lights and Slide for Imaginative Play
item.g:description: Princess Dollhouse for Kids at Toto Toys and Games Kenya. Transform your child’s playtime into a magical adventure with the Princess Dollhouse for Kids , a stunning 4-story pink mansion designed to inspire hours of imaginative play for young children across Kenya! This enchanting dollhouse is the ultimate toy for little dreamers in Nairobi, Mombasa, Kisumu, and beyond, offering a whimsical world where creativity knows no bounds. With its vibrant pink design, intricate details, and exciting features like lights and a slide, this dollhouse is perfect for kids aged 3 and up who love storytelling, role-playing, and creating their own fairy-tale moments. Crafted from high-quality, durable plastic, this 4-story princess dollhouse stands tall with a charming design that captures the essence of a royal mansion. The structure features four spacious levels, each meticulously decorated to bring the magic of a princess’s life to reality. The top floor boasts a cozy attic with a peaked roof and blue shingles, complete with a small window that adds a touch of charm. The third floor includes a luxurious bedroom with a canopy bed, a vanity mirror, and a warm light that glows softly, creating a cozy ambiance for bedtime stories. The second floor houses a grand living room with a chandelier, a sofa, and a coffee table, alongside a study area with bookshelves—perfect for a princess who loves to read. The ground floor features a fully equipped kitchen with a stove and sink, a dining area with a table and chairs, and an outdoor patio with a parasol for sunny days, encouraging endless role-play scenarios. One of the standout features of this kids’ dollhouse is the built-in slide, a vibrant pink addition that stretches from the top floor to the ground, offering a fun way for dolls to travel between levels. The slide adds an element of excitement, making playtime even more dynamic as children imagine their dolls sliding down after a day of royal adventures. The dollhouse also comes with a white picket fence and a decorative pink gate, creating a charming front yard where two adorable pet figures—a puppy and a kitten—can play, adding to the storytelling possibilities. Balconies on each floor feature white railings, providing a safe space for dolls to enjoy the view, while the warm lights in multiple rooms create a magical glow that enhances the play experience, especially during evening play sessions. Designed with young children in mind, this princess mansion dollhouse is lightweight yet sturdy, ensuring it can withstand hours of active play without tipping over. The open-front design allows easy access to all rooms, making it simple for little hands to arrange furniture, move dolls, and create their own stories. This imaginative play dollhouse encourages children to develop social skills, creativity, and problem-solving abilities as they role-play different scenarios, from hosting a royal tea party to taking care of their pet friends. It’s perfect for solo play or sharing with siblings and friends, fostering collaboration and communication during playdates. Whether you’re in the bustling city of Nairobi or the serene landscapes of Eldoret, this dollhouse brings a touch of magic to every play session, keeping kids entertained for hours.
